EmailTemplate.name: 2022 Price Increase, Downgrade after March 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscription Change Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your request has been processed successfully and your account will automatically be switched to the lower tier on your next billing date. To view the details about your subscription and billing information, login to your MyCase account, then navigate to the Billing Plan section of Firm Settings. (For step by step instructions, click here.)
If you change your mind, please send an email to billing@mycase.com and we’ll cancel your change request (up to 2 business days before your next billing date).
Please contact support with any questions here between the hours of 6am - 5pm PT; we’d be happy to help you.
Sincerely,
The MyCase Team
